Codio (UK - REMOTE) are looking for technical authors & developers to create education content for schools, colleges and universities and self-learners.

Codio is a web based IDE + authoring/publishing platform focused on teaching people to code from the age of 8 right up to adults.

If you are interested please submit an application to this job listing: https://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/99122/lead-technical-...
